original_title: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
overview: When an English cartographer arrives in Wales to tell the residents of the Welsh village of Ffynnon Garw  that their 'mountain' is only a hill, the offended community sets out to remedy the situation.
tagline: A romantic comedy about a man, a woman, and the mountain that brought them together
title: The Englishman Who Went Up a Hill But Came Down a Mountain
